body:
I'm seeing an error when trying to install `lua`.  I believe it is related to #10152

I have a potential fix, which I am testing and will provide a PR soon, if it works.

Not sure if this should be considered a lua build issue, or a spack bug.

```console
$ spack install lua
```

### Error Message

```console
$ spack install lua                                                                                                           

[snip]
                                  
==> Building lua [Package]                                                                                                                                                      
==> Executing phase: 'install'                                                                                                                                                  
==> Error: ProcessError: ./configure: Permission denied                                                                                                                         
    Command: './configure' '--prefix=/bifx/apps/spack/spack-20190108/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/lua-5.3.4-diuptpgekoebrs4bg6eprp6c4sizzaxu' '--with-lua=/bifx/apps
/spack/spack-20190108/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/lua-5.3.4-diuptpgekoebrs4bg6eprp6c4sizzaxu'                                                                      
```
title: lua fails to build  (luarocks configure not executable)
